reviews.review:
Вторая часть дилогии эпизодов, где спасение мира ни на минуту не останавливается.

Перед нами все та же Half Life 2, с чудесной графикой, играл на максималках на своем любимом корыте с крайне редкими фризами.Главным же отличием является фонарик.Он больше не зависит от костюма, это полностью автономный девайс, теперь во время бега в темноте энергия тратится лишь на бег, что позволяет значительно продлевать марш-броски.

Событийно эпизод более наполнен: тут вам и западни, и оживленные перестрелки, более "классические" задачи на смекалку, интересный сюжет, машина!

Достижения более интересны, их больше, получить, опять же, можно за одно прохождение.Но некоторые из них могут пробудить у вас батхерт, особенно гном.

Суммируя, мы получим более интересный эпизод, более продолжительный, с несколько улучшенным интерфейсом.Для меня, Half-Life 2: Episode Two безоговорочно лидирует над Half-Life 2: Episode One, и эта игра крайне рекомендуется, если не обязана, быть пройденой.

9,5/10

A short, but unforgettable conclusion to the Half-Life 2 games.

The second and probably best episode installment after the great Half-life 2. As with the rest of the games in the series the characters and story are top notch as is the level design and character animation which are even better than the last episode. The section of the game where you drive around and defend buildings in your souped up muscle car is beyond awesome. A very well executed game with a conclusion that is suprisingly emotional.

WHat\'s disappointing though is that Valve has chosen to leave us hanging so long for Episode Three or Half-life 3. Give us fans a break. We can only take so much for so long.

Half-Life 2: Episode Two is an amazing addition to the Half-Life series. Episode Two is twice as long as Episode One and is filled with non-stop action in the scenic forest mountains. Episode Two improves upon everything from the first Episode making it the superior Episode of the two and is real treat to play making every moment enjoyable. The story and environments all tie in very well and unfold nicely as the game progresses which you just want to continue going to see what is next. Now we just have to wait for Episode 3 or Half-Life 3... will either ever come out or is this the end of the road of a fantastic series?

What a game!

Obviously a game made a long time ago. But one of the few games you can play and still be amazed at how advanced it is. This has been my first playthrough of the series, fantastic games that are just as playable today, as they were when they were released 10+ years ago!

G-Man: Doctor Freeemaaan. I realize this moment may not be the most convenient for a 'heart-to-heart', but I had to wait until your... 'friends' were otherwise occupied. Hm. 
G-Man: There was a time they cared nothing for Miss Vance... When their only experience of humanity was a crowbar coming at them down a steel corridor. When I plucked her from Black Mesa, I acted in the face of objections that she was a mere child and of no practical use to anyone. I have learned to ignore such naysayers when... quelling them... was out of the question. 
G-Man: Still, I am not one to squander my investments... and I remain confident she was worth far more than the initial... appraisal. That's why I must now extract from you some small repayment owed for your own survival. See her safely to White Forest, Doctor Freeman. I wish I could do more than keep an eye on you, but I have agreed to abide by certain... restrictions. Mmm. 
G-Man: [to Alyx] Well... now... listen carefully, my dear. When you see your father relay these words: Prepare for unforeseen consequences. 

You bet your ass that was going to happen and boy I was in shock after that. BUY THIS GAME

[b] Half-Life 2: Episode Two (2007) Valve [/b]
Финальный эпизод серии "HL2" на данный момент. Главной его особенностью стало существенное изменение геймплея. Мир и локации получились более открытыми, что позволяет часто маневрировать, передвигаться на большие расстояния и использовать недоступные ранее тактики. Продолжительность эпизода существенно подросла по сравнению с первым. Сюжет развивает и продолжает общую историю, сталкивая Фримена с новыми врагами и игровыми ситуациями, завершаясь неожиданным, очень сильным и эмоциональным финалом.
Технологически, эпизод построен на обновленном и доработанном движке "Source". Физика реализована на новом, качественном  уровне. Сильно выросла детализация мира, а улучшенная работа с тенями и светом сделали его более живым. Всем фанатам лучшего в мире шутера от первого лица играть строго обязательно. Ненавистникам Гордона Фримена, серии игр "Half-Life 2" играть строго не рекомендуется. Как и читать этот мини-обзор.
[b] Рейтинг - 90/100 [/b]

Episode 2 is once again a continuation to the last game which picks up on yet another cliffhanger. Gordon and Alyx have barely survived the blast of the Combine's reactor blast. They thought they succeed in their mission only to discover that the combine is attempting to reopen the rift to the Xem world. After Alyx contacts her father at the freedom fighters' base in the middle of the forest, Gordon and Alyx must travel there to help defend the base from the Combine and put an end to their attempt to connect to the Xem world. The game provides more to offer and has a very good way of putting a player through a lot of suspense. The game ends with a cliffhanger as it was intended to continue on to an Episodes 3 & 4. However those segments were either cancelled or in development hell, and for years Valve went on and off about the status of a "Half-Life 3" which is intended to give the franchise a conclusion. There has been leaked artwork on the project and a huge demand from die hard fans that want to see a true ending to the franchise with another game. Even the Naughty Dog company expressed high interest in making the third game by striking a deal with Valve. So there is a noise for a continuation for Half-Life, it's just uncertain when it will happen. I just hope it will happen in this life time cause Half-Life is one of the most prized first person shooter games of all time it strongly deserves a true conclusion cause after playing this game I want to see what will become of Gordon & Alyx and maybe even see what becomes of the G-Man as well. Only time will tell from this point, so until then keep on fighting for Half-Life 3 to happen.

Gordon Freeman's voice actor is gonna die before Half-Life 3 ever comes out.

directly after the events of episode 1, we find that the train crashed, you wonder the forest far outside city 17, and you find out that the Combine follwed you. this is all i can really say because the story does have something major early on, so i wont go farther than that. 

2 new enemies were added, the antlion worker that shoots acid, and my least favorite, the hunter who tend to run around and shoot you with fletchettes, ramming and another attack.

2 new characters were added, Uriah, a Vortigaunt scientist who serves as  Arne Magnusson's  assistant at White Forest. and the second one is  Arne Magnusson, one of the scientists from Black Mesa, he isnt the nicest guy, isnt like the others, thats for sure, but i do think i have a reason why he does like Gordon Freeman, he was the owner of that microwave casserole you blew up back in the first game.

the gameplay is pretty good, the gravity gun is used to shoot the Magunssons device (a bomb used to blow up striders), a new car, and along with the car, lots of driving which is, in my opinon, better than the first game. 

overall this is by far the best episode, i would highly reccomend getting this as soon as you can, its amazing and so far the ending of the series until we hear about a third installment.

half life 3 plzzzzzzzzzzzzzz!!!!

Ce titre est une claque. Voilà. Ce titre est une passerelle de choix entre les entreprises de Black Mesa et Aperture: graphiquement, il n'est vraiment pas mal du tout. Auditivement, il est d'une qualité exquise. Scénaristiquement, il met un terme à la licence d'une façon remarquable mais sans en mettre vraiment, la fin étant le début du récit inachevé qu'est [i]Half Life 3[/i]. Ce titre est sans hésitation l'un des grands pilliers du jeu vidéo.

D'un certain point de vue, la licence est tellement bien que si elle donnait naissance au tristement non sorti [i]Half Life 3[/i] elle perdrait de sa valeur: ce titre jamais sorti laisse une certaine place à l'imagination du joueur à propos du [i]Borealis[/i] et du lien entre Black Mesa et Aperture. Si ce titre venait à sortir par malheur un jour, cela enlèverait l'aspect magique de la licence en déchirant sans appel une légende, celle du troisième titre.

Note: 16/20

The original and first road game that inspired Final Fantasy XV.

It's definitely the best HL2 in my opinion. Lots of new things added. Good gameplay and puzzles as usual, lots of ways to do things, and it's refreshing to see a new perspective other than the dystopian City 17. The end segment is my favourite by far, very frantic and you find yourself using everything at your disposal for sure.
Just finished. Can't wait for half life 3.

Now this is a proper expansion into the HL story. Picks up after Ep. 1 and does a heck of a better job of moving things along. Once again, gameplay and story are superb but now there a lot more going on. Youre kept on the edge of your seat fighting dynamic enemies, powering through the combine and watching plot twists develop more plot twists. 

More answers and question about the G-man and what the heck is going on so far. Also epic Aperture science Easter egg that you cant miss. Really looking forward to the next part..... whenever it may come.

TLDR: Strap in, get the game and play Black Mesa-> Half Life -> Ep.1 -> Ep.2 as you are slingshotted into on hell of a ride that makes other AAA games envious. This doesnt just meet the standard, this IS the standard.

Never gets old despite its age. I will gladly replay the series "when" half life 3 will be released.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
+ great atmosphere
+ solid gameplay
+ astonishing effects/particles
+ deep storyline(for those who played the whole series including the half life 1 ones)
+ complex and easy to learn level editor
+ Fakefactory Cinematic Mod (without alyx/barney/kleiner/magnusson models)

[h1]Cons[/h1]
- weird lighting/shaders on lowest settings
- a few bad physics sometimes ( this can be mostly noticed in half life 2 game)
- Fakefactory Cinematic Mod's Alyx model
- still waiting for Half Life 3

[h1]Pros related to Source Engine[/h1]
+ able to run games on PCs from 1998
+ Source Film Maker

[h1]Cons related to Source Engine[/h1]
- Half Life 3……………...…..
